nodes.text: Rusher's Brigade was a unit of mercenaries active during the Republic Dark Age under the command of Jarrow Rusher, operating from the ship Diligence. It consisted of eight battalions, each of which was named after an ancient weapon. In 1032 BBY, they were recruited by Sith Lord Daiman to fight in an ambush against Daiman's brother Odion. Of the three thousand members of the brigade to enter the battle, all but five hundred sixty were reported killed or missing.
